testimonials.name: Alex Naymark
testimonials.quote: Matt has put together a very valuable tool for anyone in OMSCS! Organized, concise, and the exam preparation is unmatched. Cheers Matt, you made something very cool and I hope to see it grow!

testimonials.name: Melissa Chen
testimonials.quote: Matt's notes are excellent. They are well-organized, detailed, and save me a lot of studying time. I really appreciate that he built this for OMSCS students!

testimonials.name: Robert Ehlers
testimonials.quote: Matt's notes were an invaluable resource for my success in GIOS. My exam scores definitely increased by reviewing them beforehand. Having such a detailed and well organized reference made finding course material much easier than hunting through lecture videos.

testimonials.name: Samuel Bigio
testimonials.quote: If you get a chance to study Matt's notes you can tell the effort he put into it, and it really pays off.

testimonials.name: Taneem Ibrahim
testimonials.quote: I found Mattâ€™s notes to be a life saver in studying for Computer Networks exams. The notes are very thorough and articulates the central ideas in each lecture very well. Thank you Matt for taking the time to create these invaluable resources for the OMSCS students.

testimonials.name: George P. Burdell
testimonials.quote: Matt's notes helped me complete all of OMSCS in one semester.
